metadata.description: AI-powered skill marketplace featuring quantitative trading, executive productivity, and intelligent automation tools for Claude Code

plugins.name: ai-quant-trader
plugins.description: AI-powered quantitative trading system with technical analysis (RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands), sentiment analysis, multi-factor models, risk management (VaR, position sizing), and strategy backtesting. Activates for stock analysis, trading signals, portfolio risk, backtesting queries.
plugins.author: Agent-Skill-Creator

plugins.name: air-quality-advisor
plugins.description: Real-time air quality monitoring and health advisory for global travelers and executives. Provides AQI data, health recommendations, and activity advice for cities worldwide. Activates for air quality, AQI, pollution, outdoor exercise safety queries.
plugins.author: Agent-Skill-Creator

plugins.name: article-to-prototype
plugins.description: Extracts technical content from articles (PDF, web, markdown, notebooks) and generates functional prototypes in appropriate programming languages. Activates for implementing code from papers, tutorials, or documentation.
plugins.author: Agent-Skill-Creator

plugins.name: daily-wealth-brief
plugins.description: Executive-grade daily financial briefing combining market overview, portfolio performance, and personalized insights for high-net-worth individuals. Activates for morning briefing, wealth summary, market update queries.
plugins.author: Agent-Skill-Creator

plugins.name: deal-intelligence
plugins.description: M&A and deal intelligence platform for executives. Analyzes potential acquisitions, tracks deal flow, and provides competitive intelligence. Activates for M&A analysis, deal evaluation, acquisition target queries.
plugins.author: Agent-Skill-Creator

plugins.name: decision-matrix
plugins.description: Structured decision-making framework for executives. Creates weighted decision matrices, evaluates options, and provides recommendation reports. Activates for complex decisions, option comparison, decision analysis queries.
plugins.author: Agent-Skill-Creator

plugins.name: executive-calendar
plugins.description: Intelligent calendar management for busy executives. Optimizes scheduling, manages time zones, and provides meeting preparation briefs. Activates for calendar optimization, meeting scheduling, time management queries.
plugins.author: Agent-Skill-Creator

plugins.name: executive-travel-intelligence
plugins.description: Comprehensive travel intelligence for global executives. Combines flight tracking, hotel recommendations, local insights, and security advisories. Activates for travel planning, flight status, destination intelligence queries.
plugins.author: Agent-Skill-Creator

plugins.name: global-market-pulse
plugins.description: Real-time global market monitoring dashboard. Tracks stocks, crypto, forex, and commodities with alerts and analysis. Activates for market overview, price checks, global market status queries.
plugins.author: Agent-Skill-Creator

plugins.name: portfolio-pulse
plugins.description: Investment portfolio dashboard tracking stocks, crypto, commodities, and forex. Provides risk analysis, diversification scoring, and rebalancing suggestions. Activates for portfolio analysis, holdings check, asset allocation queries.
plugins.author: Agent-Skill-Creator

plugins.name: weather-farming-advisor
plugins.description: Agricultural weather intelligence for smart farming. Provides 7-day forecasts, soil analysis, crop suitability scoring, and farming operation recommendations. Activates for farming weather, crop advice, agricultural forecast queries.
plugins.author: Agent-Skill-Creator
